unrestrictedtwentyquestion

Class UnrestrictedTwentyQuestionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • unrestrictedtwentyquestion.UnrestrictedTwentyQuestionController

  • public class UnrestrictedTwentyQuestionController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller class for the Twenty Question Game. It is responsible for controlling the behavior of the question binary tree. It also contains a method that learn (update the binary tree).
    Version:
    Dec 12
    Author:
    AP
